players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Charlie is the mafioso, I investigated him last night and found out he's one of them."
Charlie: "I have nothing to hide and trust everyone in this game."
Charlie: "I'm surprised by Alice's accusation and I have no reason to believe she's lying. Let's focus on finding the real killer instead of pointing fingers at each other."

Bob: "Hello everyone, I'm glad we're all here today. Since Diana was found dead last night and Alice accused Charlie of being the mafioso, I think it's best if we discuss this further as a group to figure out what happened."
